attributes.action: If a Prime Minister is ousted or quits there should be a General Election.
attributes.additional_details: I believe if a PM quits or ousted the people should decide who they want as PM not somebody they didn’t vote for.
attributes.background: After three years of floundering around the 2016 referendum vote appears to be out of date as the general opinion appears to be shifting. Rather then the Conservative Party being allowed to elect their next leader and forcing their new leader upon the general public Let the people decide the party.
